title: Arige moreyiDalo
sahitya:
Arige moreyiDalo hariye vicArisuvara obbara kANe


caraNam 1    halavanga guNadavanobbarasu taleyilladavanobba pradhAni 
taLavAra kirigaNNinavanobba balu boTTu guNadobba shyAnubhOga
    caraNam 2    arasana heNDati ratigAri arasana magaLu ahankAri 
arasana soseyobbaLanyAyakAri arasana dAsiyu ati krUri
    caraNam 3    naDunaDuve yamana paTTaNavu ennoDeya pancEndriya daivakaru 
taDeyadante nI dayamADO ennoDeya purandara viTTalane
